solution_line_template: First find how many students go to the new school: {total_students} students * {transfer_percent} = <<{total_students}*{transfer_percent}={students_to_new_school}>>{students_to_new_school} students

Then divide that number by {num_grade_levels} to find how many students are at each grade level: {students_to_new_school} students / {num_grade_levels} grades = <<{students_to_new_school}/{num_grade_levels}={students_per_grade}>>{students_per_grade} students/grade

Then subtract the {advanced_class_size} students in the gifted class: {students_per_grade} students - {advanced_class_size} students = <<{students_per_grade}-{advanced_class_size}={students_after_advanced_class}>>{students_after_advanced_class} students

Then divide that number by {num_additional_classes} to find the number of students in each other class: {students_after_advanced_class} students / {num_additional_classes} classes = <<{students_after_advanced_class}/{num_additional_classes}={students_per_normal_class}>>{students_per_normal_class} students/class
